title: Rhapsody
content:
+1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

Cazador's love of poetry arose after he read one on the naked stomach of a dead child in his homeland. The child was hung from the lowest branch of a tree. Cazador read the poem, and looked at the child, and he knew that here was the artform for him.

Dagger Light Finesse Thrown

Rhapsody is one of the Daggers in Baldur's Gate 3. Rhapsody is a very rare dagger dropped by Cazador Szarr. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and
